rules.justification: The InternalsVisibleTo property will expose your internal objects to any extension with the given name, publisher, and ID. Using access modifiers for security-sensitive code is not recommended. - App can be used by other SDP apps.
The name of variables and parameters must be suffixed with the type or object name.
Follow the style guide about the best practices for naming.
Use the UsageCategory and ApplicationArea properties to be searchable (Increased importance)
Any Commit(); needs a code comment
Show warning about code metrics for each function or trigger
Every object needs to specify a value for the Access property.
Events in internal codeunits should be accessible
Confirm() must be implemented through the Confirm Management codeunit
